lyrics:
7 contributorsluck lyricsverse 1
how can we make amends
when we said all we said
i call and you dont pick up
how can i say instead
that i hope its for the best
i wont and i wont give up
im sorry mother
i know i let you down
im sorry for how
i up and left this town
how can we push aside
all the bad and make it right
now you got me all choked up

chorus 1
im sorry brother
i know i let you down
im sorry for how
i up and left this town
but please just listen
cause i dont ask for much
i am my own man
i make my own luck

verse 2
how can we both take sides
when we know nothings right
open up the door thats shut
how can i have my pride
and drink away my soul tonight
sorrows filling up my cup
you might also likechorus 1
im sorry father
i know i let you down
im sorry for how
i up and left this town
but please just listen
cause i dont ask for much
i am my own man
i make my own luck

chorus 2
well some birds arent meant to be caged
and i just cant see the light of day
please forgive me i cant remember
please forgive me no one is calling
please forgive me i cant believe it no
gonna pick myself up so i dont let this ember grow
even if i mess up i wont let this ever go
its hard to stay its hard to stay
cause some birds arent meant to be caged

verse 3
how can i set us free
im what you taught me to be
shouldnt that be enough
its time that we make amends
lets forget the things we said
you know we were all just stuck
chorus 1
im sorry mother
i know i let you down
im sorry father
i didnt stick around
but please just listen
cause i dont ask for much
i am my own man
i make my own luck

bridge
please just listen
cause i dont ask for much
just like my old man
i make my own luck

chorus 2
and some birds arent meant to be caged
and some just cant see the light of day
please forgive me i cant remember
please forgive me no one is calling
please forgive me i cant believe it no
gonna pick myself up so i dont let this ember grow
even if i mess up i wont let this ever go
its hard to stay its hard to stay
cause some birds arent meant to be caged
outro
please just listen
cause i dont ask for much
i am my own man
i make my own luck
please just listen
cause i dont ask for much
i am my own man
i make my own luck5embed
